p.k: Her name is Green, she is alone in a world that doesn't belong to her anymore. She is a female orangutan, victim of deforestation and resource exploitation. This film is an emotional journey with Green's final days. It is a visual ride presenting the treasures of rainforest biodiversity and the devastating impacts of logging and land clearing for palm oil plantations. A gripping account of an ecological disaster and a radical look at menâ€™s mass destructive power on the planet.
